title: Phage G genome: AI analysis maps out world's largest cultivated bacteria-killing virus
description: Through cutting-edge methods and advanced artificial intelligence analysis, UNC Charlotte researchers leading a multidisciplinary team across four universities have successfully resolved the entire genome of "Phage G," the largest bacterial virus (aka bacteriophages or phages) ever cultivated in a physical lab environment.

title: YouTube Will Use AI To Sharpen Lower-Resolution Videos On TVs
description: Google’s YouTube will use artificial intelligence to improve the visual clarity of many low-resolution videos on its platform when viewed on TV screens, the web and mobile devices. YouTube will first implement the feature, known as upscaling, for videos that were originally uploaded at resolutions under 1080p, according to a blog post Wednesday by senior product director Kurt Wilms. The company will support upscaling to even higher 4K quality “in the near future,”
content:

title: Bank of Canada unsure on AI impact on economy
description: The Bank of Canada says it doesn’t know how new artificial intelligence products will affect the Canadian economy
content:
OTTAWA — The Bank of Canada says it doesn’t know how new artificial intelligence products will affect the Canadian economy.
Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem says the technology has the potential for both economic benefit and harm.
